TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicILInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对多种用来为动态方法生成 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 和元数据的其他方式的支持，包括用来创建标记和插入代码的方法、异常处理，以及局部变量签名 Blob。

span.span: Provides support for alternative ways to generate the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) and metadata for a dynamic method, including methods for creating tokens and for inserting the code, exception handling, and local variable signature blobs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许开发人员能够编写而不是使用其自己 MSIL 生成器。The class allows developers to write their own MSIL generators instead of using . 若要创建其他类型的实例，调用方法，依次类推，生成的 MSIL 必须包含这些实体的令牌。To create instances of other types, call methods, and so on, the MSIL you generate must include tokens for those entities. 类提供的几个重载方法，它返回令牌的当前作用域中有效。The class provides several overloads of the method, which return tokens valid in the scope of the current . 例如，如果您需要调用的重载方法中，你可以获取的重载，并将其传递给方法以获得嵌入 MSIL 中的令牌。For example, if you need to call an overload of the method, you can obtain a for that overload and pass it to the method to obtain a token to embed in your MSIL. 创建后的局部变量签名、 异常和代码体的数组，可以使用， ，和方法将它们插入与关联您对象。Once you have created arrays for your local variable signature, exceptions, and code body, you can use the , , and methods to insert them into the associated with your object. 生成您自己的元数据和 MSIL 需要熟悉的公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"和"分区 III: CIL 指令集"。Generating your own metadata and MSIL requires familiarity with the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. > [!NOTE] > 不要使用生成通过直接调用委托构造函数创建另一种动态方法的委托的代码。Do not use to generate code that creates a delegate to another dynamic method by calling the delegate constructor directly. 请改用方法来创建委托。Instead, use the method to create the delegate. 使用委托构造函数创建的委托不具有对目标动态方法的引用。A delegate that is created with the delegate constructor does not have a reference to the target dynamic method. 动态方法仍在使用委托时可能会被垃圾回收。The dynamic method might be reclaimed by garbage collection while the delegate is still in use.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod DynamicMethod { get; }
.property instance class System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod DynamicMethod
Public ReadOnly Property DynamicMethod As DynamicMethod
public: property System::Reflection::Emit::DynamicMethod ^ DynamicMethod { System::Reflection::Emit::DynamicMethod ^ get(); };
member this.DynamicMethod : System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod

summary.span: 获取动态方法，该方法的方法体由当前实例生成。

span.span: Gets the dynamic method whose body is generated by the current instance.

value.span: 一个 对象，当前 对象正在为该对象所表示的动态方法生成代码。

span.span: A object representing the dynamic method for which the current object is generating code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象始终是一种动态方法与相关联。A object is always associated with a dynamic method. 目的类是提供另一种方法的 MSIL 流、 异常处理和局部变量签名插入一个动态方法，开发者要生成 MSIL，而无需使用类。The purpose of the class is to provide another way of inserting the MSIL stream, exception handling, and local variable signature into a dynamic method, for developers who want to generate MSIL without using the class.

summary.span: 获取一个在当前 的范围内有效的标记，它表示关联动态方法的 MSIL 流中的一个字符串、字段、方法、类型或签名。

span.span: Gets a token, valid in the scope of the current , representing a string, field, method, type, or signature in the MSIL stream for the associated dynamic method.

.method public hidebysig instance int32 GetTokenFor(unsigned int8[] signature) cil managed
Public Function GetTokenFor (signature As Byte()) As Integer
public: int GetTokenFor(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ signature);
member this.GetTokenFor : byte[] -> int

span.span: An array that contains the signature.

summary.span: 获取一个在当前 的范围内有效的标记，它表示关联动态方法的签名。

span.span: Gets a token, valid in the scope of the current , representing the signature for the associated dynamic method.

returns.span: 一个标记，该标记可嵌入关联动态方法的元数据和 MSIL 流中。

span.span: A token that can be embedded in the metadata and the MSIL stream for the associated dynamic method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 签名 blob 的信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"。For information on signature blobs, see the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

Public Function GetTokenFor (method As DynamicMethod) As Integer
public: int GetTokenFor(System::Reflection::Emit::DynamicMethod ^ method);
member this.GetTokenFor : System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod -> int

span.span: The dynamic method to call.

summary.span: 获取一个在当前 的范围内有效的标记，它表示将从关联方法调用的动态方法。

span.span: Gets a token, valid in the scope of the current , representing a dynamic method to be called from the associated method.

returns.span: 一个标记，可以嵌入关联动态方法的 MSIL 流中，作为 MSIL 指令的目标。

span.span: A token that can be embedded in the MSIL stream for the associated dynamic method, as the target of an MSIL instruction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的重载返回的令牌，可从当前与关联的动态方法调用动态方法对象。The token returned by this method overload allows you to call a dynamic method from the dynamic method associated with the current object. 若要调用关联动态方法以递归方式，请将的值传递属性。To call the associated dynamic method recursively, pass the value of the property.

span.span: The field to be accessed.

summary.span: 获取一个在当前 的范围内有效的标记，它表示将从关联动态方法访问的字段。

span.span: Gets a token, valid in the scope of the current , representing a field to be accessed from the associated dynamic method.

returns.span: 当前 对象的范围内的一个标记，可用作访问字段的 MSIL 指令的操作数。

span.span: A token that can be used as the operand of an MSIL instruction that accesses fields, in the scope of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你必须获取的令牌将通过关联与当前的动态方法访问的任何字段对象。You must obtain a token for any field that will be accessed by the dynamic method associated with the current object. 使用方法以获取对于想要访问的字段，然后使用属性来获取。Use the method to get a for the field you want to access, then use the property to get the .

summary.span: 获取一个在当前 的范围内有效的标记，它表示将从关联动态方法访问的方法。

span.span: Gets a token, valid in the scope of the current , representing a method to be accessed from the associated dynamic method.

returns.span: 当前 对象的范围内的一个标记，可以用作访问方法的 MSIL 指令的操作数（如 或 ）。

span.span: A token that can be used as the operand of an MSIL instruction that accesses methods, such as or , in the scope of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你必须获取的令牌将通过关联与当前的动态方法访问的任何方法对象。You must obtain a token for any method that will be accessed by the dynamic method associated with the current object. 使用方法以获取你想要访问，以及如何将方法属性来获取。Use the method to get a for the method you want to access, and then use the property to get the . > [!NOTE] > 对于属于泛型类型的方法，使用方法重载并指定泛型类型。For a method that belongs to a generic type, use the method overload and specify a for the generic type.

returns.span: 当前 对象的范围内的一个标记，可以用作需要一个类型的 MSIL 指令的操作数。

span.span: A token that can be used as the operand of an MSIL instruction that requires a type, in the scope of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的重载返回的令牌，可定义本地变量类型，并发出创建类型的实例中当前与关联的动态方法的 MSIL对象。The token returned by this method overload allows you to define a local variable type, and emit MSIL to create an instance of a type in the dynamic method associated with the current object. 若要获取表示的类型，使用属性。To get a representing a type, use the property.

summary.span: 设置关联动态方法的代码体。

span.span: Sets the code body of the associated dynamic method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks MSIL 流上执行有效性检查。No validity checks are performed on the MSIL stream. 第二次调用此方法的第二个替换第一个的 MSIL 流。Calling this method a second time replaces the first MSIL stream with the second. 生成您自己的元数据和 MSIL 需要熟悉的公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"和"分区 III: CIL 指令集"。Generating your own metadata and MSIL requires familiarity with the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

span.span: The maximum number of items on the operand stack when the method is executing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一种方法的异常元数据定义的位置和大小的所有`try`， `catch`， `finally`，筛选器和 fault 块。The exception metadata for a method defines the location and size of all `try`, `catch`, `finally`, filter, and fault blocks. 有关此元数据的布局的信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"。For information on the layout of this metadata, see the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

summary.span: 设置描述关联动态方法的局部变量布局的局部变量签名。

span.span: Sets the local variable signature that describes the layout of local variables for the associated dynamic method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 局部变量签名描述方法的局部变量的布局。The local variable signature describes the layout of a method's local variables. 若要简化的局部变量签名的构造，请使用`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)方法以获取的签名。To simplify construction of the local variable signature, use the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method to get a for the local signature. 本地变量签名的信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"。For information on local variable signatures, see the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetLocalSignature (byte* localSignature, int signatureSize);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetLocalSignature(unsigned int8* localSignature, int32 signatureSize) cil managed
public: void SetLocalSignature(System::Byte* localSignature, int signatureSize);
member this.SetLocalSignature : nativeptr<byte> * int -> unit

param.name: localSignature
param.span: 一个数组，其中包含关联 的局部变量布局。

span.span: An array that contains the layout of local variables for the associated .
The number of bytes in the signature.

summary.span: 设置描述关联动态方法的局部变量布局的局部变量签名。

span.span: Sets the local variable signature that describes the layout of local variables for the associated dynamic method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 局部变量签名描述方法的局部变量的布局。The local variable signature describes the layout of a method's local variables. 若要简化的局部变量签名的构造，请使用`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)方法以获取的签名。To simplify construction of the local variable signature, use the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method to get a for the local signature. 本地变量签名的信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"。For information on local variable signatures, see the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

span.span: is and is greater than 0.
is less than 0.

permission.span: 直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任的或透明的代码使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
